title: UN PRME-Influenced Pedagogical Approaches for Integrating Sustainability Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sustainability concepts and practical experience in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational program applying sustainability principles in real work environments using VR simulations and digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the social, environmental, and economic aspects of sustainability principles using the five impactful teaching methods of UN PRME.
Learners can conduct projects to diagnose and resolve sustainability issues in professional fields (medical/legal/technical) within simulation/VR environments.
Learners can measure their understanding and application abilities through sustainability literacy assessment tools.

resources: UN PRME (Principles for Responsible Management Education) Guidelines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
